articles.title: Alec Baldwin loses last-gasp bid to dismiss Rust manslaughter case - BBC.com
articles.description: The judge rejects the actor's latest challenge, meaning the trial will begin on 9 July.
articles.content:
By Samantha Granville, BBC News, Los Angeles
A judge has denied a last-ditch effort by Alec Baldwin to dismiss the involuntary manslaughter charge against him in the fatal shooting on the set of his… [+3994 chars]

articles.title: Metal Gear Solid 3 remake will credit Hideo Kojima and the original developers since "they're a part of these games too," and one current dev says he'd "like nothing better" than to have the OG director back - Gamesradar
articles.description: Having the original team back would be "the dream," says Noriaki Okamura

articles.title: China gears up for deep space missions after collecting 1935 grams of lunar far side samples - SpaceNews
articles.description: China gears up for deep space missions after collecting 1,935 grams of lunar far side samples China is getting set for future deep space missions, having retrieved nearly two kilograms of lunar samples from the moon's far side.
articles.content:
HELSINKI China is getting set for future deep space missions, having retrieved nearly two kilograms of lunar samples from the moon’s far side.
